#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;

bool can_be_covered(float a, float b, float c, float d)
{
    if(         (a*b)/(c) == int(a*b)/int(c) and  (a*b)/(d) == int(a*b)/int(d)   )
    return true;
    else
    return false;
}

int main()
{
    int T;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    for(int x = 0; x < T; x++)
    {
        float a,b,c,d;
        scanf("%f %f %f %f", &a, &b, &c, &d);
        bool x = can_be_covered(a,b,c,d);
        if(x == true)
        printf("%s \n", "yes");
        else
        printf("%s \n", "no");
    }
    return 0;
}
